entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 8:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
